Title: Account Registration and Management
Content: When registering and managing your Xiaohongshu account, it is crucial to follow specific guidelines to avoid issues such as low visibility and limited engagement. If your account has been inactive for over three months, it is advisable to register a new one. Avoid using a device that has previously been banned by Xiaohongshu, as the platform tracks device parameters like motherboard number and IMEI. To circumvent these issues, consider using an emulator like Nox Player, which allows you to generate random device parameters. Once registered, adhere to the 'one device, one account' rule to prevent being flagged as a marketing account. This approach ensures that your account remains in good standing and is more likely to gain traction.

Title: Avoiding Manipulative Practices
Content: Engaging in manipulative practices such as mutual likes, follows, and artificially inflating engagement metrics can harm your Xiaohongshu account. Participating in groups or forums that promote these activities can lead to your account being flagged for suspicious activity. For instance, if someone maliciously inflates your likes without corresponding comments or shares, the platform may limit your account's reach, suspecting foul play. Instead, focus on organic growth by creating high-quality content that naturally attracts engagement. Avoid sharing your account details publicly to prevent others from manipulating your metrics. By maintaining genuine interactions, you ensure the long-term health and credibility of your account.

Title: Content Strategy and Consistency
Content: Developing a consistent content strategy is essential for building a successful Xiaohongshu account. Avoid frequently deleting or editing your posts, as this can negatively impact your account's ranking and visibility. The platform's algorithm may interpret frequent changes as suspicious activity, potentially flagging your account as a marketing account. Instead, focus on creating diverse content that includes personal insights, tips, and experiences. A good ratio is one promotional post for every three informational or personal posts. This balance helps in building trust and engagement with your audience. Additionally, ensure that your content aligns with the interests of Xiaohongshu's predominantly young, urban user base. By maintaining a consistent and strategic approach, you can steadily grow your account's reach and influence.
